alert.note: Alert for McLeod (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 8:32PM CDT until June 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McLeod County in central Minnesota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Silver Lake, or 7 miles east of Hutchinson, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Silver Lake around 850 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lester Prairie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
